original: @42a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @42a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sragdha ra sto tram /
analyzed: sragdha ra sto tram /
translated: Sragdharastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa /
analyzed: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of the Holder of Flower Garlands

original: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble and venerable Tara,üîΩthe protector of those in distress.üîΩThe light of the jewels on the crowns of the heads of the hosts of gods at your feet,

original: phongs skyabs 'phags ma sgrol ma khyed zhabs lha tshogs rnams kyi mgo bo'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od //
analyzed: phongs skyabs 'phags ma sgrol ma khyed zhabs lha tshogs rnams kyi mgo bo'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od //
translated: O noble Tara,

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba lta bur dmar ba'i phun sum tshogs pa phog pas dmar ba ni //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba lta bur dmar ba'i phun sum tshogs pa phog pas dmar ba ni //
translated: is red, as if struck by the splendor of the rising sun.

original: smug rtsi dmar ba gsal po bkod nas shin tu yun ring ma lon pa dang 'dra dag la //
analyzed: smug rtsi dmar ba gsal po bkod nas shin tu yun ring ma lon pa dang 'dra dag la //
translated: It is as if clear red lac has been applied and has not yet dried.

original: mgo btud spyi bor thal sbyar bkod pa bdag gis bstod gsar me tog phreng bas gus mchod bgyi //
analyzed: mgo btud spyi bor thal sbyar bkod pa bdag gis bstod gsar me tog phreng bas gus mchod bgyi //
translated: With my head bowed and palms joined at my head, I offer this new garland of praise,

original: rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me nang lus lhung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa //
analyzed: rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me nang lus lhung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa //
translated: thinking, Which direction is unfortunate, where my body has fallen into the fire of suffering difficult to cross?

original: blun zhing ci ci bgyi snyam lan cig ma lags rtsom bgyi don ma mchis pas dub pa bdag / mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gros kyis 'gro ba snang ba re bar @42b bcas pas nam mkha'i nyi zla yi //
analyzed: blun zhing ci ci bgyi snyam lan cig ma lags rtsom bgyi don ma mchis pas dub pa bdag / mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gros kyis 'gro ba snang ba re bar @42b bcas pas nam mkha'i nyi zla yi //
translated: I am blind, and I go by the way that others go. I have hope in the light of the sun and moon in the sky.

original: 'od ltar gzhan dag rnams las khums te sdig pa 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la brten par bgyid //
analyzed: 'od ltar gzhan dag rnams las khums te sdig pa 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la brten par bgyid //
translated: I rely on you, who are like the light of the sun and moon in the sky, who destroy the darkness of sin.

original: khyod kyi thugs rjes nges par sems can lam rnams kun la bye brag med par rab bzhugs shing //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs rjes nges par sems can lam rnams kun la bye brag med par rab bzhugs shing //
translated: By your compassion you certainly abide in all the paths of sentient beings without distinction.

original: de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra'ang de dag rnams kyi nang du gdon mi 'tshal bar bzung 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra'ang de dag rnams kyi nang du gdon mi 'tshal bar bzung 'gyur ba //
translated: Since they are protected, I too am certainly protected among them.

original: nus mthu 'gro ba mtha' dag sdig mun nyi ma'i gzugs la'ang do zla mchis pa ma lags mod //
analyzed: nus mthu 'gro ba mtha' dag sdig mun nyi ma'i gzugs la'ang do zla mchis pa ma lags mod //
translated: Your power is not rivaled even by the sun, which is the light of the world.

original: de lta na yang kho bo sdug ba kye ma'o nyes byas ngan mkhas ngan pa rab tu brjid //
analyzed: de lta na yang kho bo sdug ba kye ma'o nyes byas ngan mkhas ngan pa rab tu brjid //
translated: Nevertheless, alas, I am miserable. I am a sinner, a fool, and a bad person.

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa rab tu mi bsal ri bo gangs can klung ngogs kyi //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa rab tu mi bsal ri bo gangs can klung ngogs kyi //
translated: The sun's rays do not dispel the darkness of the snowy mountains and the banks of rivers.

original: shang shong kha ba'i dum grugs dkrigs pas bsil bar dbyar skam rin chen gling gi tshong khang gi / nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa'i nang na dbul zhing 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: shang shong kha ba'i dum grugs dkrigs pas bsil bar dbyar skam rin chen gling gi tshong khang gi / nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa'i nang na dbul zhing 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig bcom ldan 'das //
translated: But the cool rays of the moon, the mother of the world, the sole mother of all, the Blessed One,

original: khyod kyis mgon du bgyis kyang mgon pa mchis pas skal nyams bdag ni smad cing smad pa'i gnas //
analyzed: khyod kyis mgon du bgyis kyang mgon pa mchis pas skal nyams bdag ni smad cing smad pa'i gnas //
translated: though you are my protector, I am still unprotected, and I am the object of contempt and scorn.

original: ma yang nu ma'i ched du rnam pa mang du du ba'i bu la skyo bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: ma yang nu ma'i ched du rnam pa mang du du ba'i bu la skyo bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Even a mother, for the sake of her own breasts, becomes weary of her son who cries so much.

original: nyi ma re re dam pa ma yin don du gnyer la bskos pa'i pha yang khro sel na //
analyzed: nyi ma re re dam pa ma yin don du gnyer la bskos pa'i pha yang khro sel na //
translated: Even a father, who is appointed to be the protector of his son, becomes angry with him if he seeks improper things day after day.

original: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum 'dod 'bras bu yangs pa dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga mchog chen te //
analyzed: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum 'dod 'bras bu yangs pa dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga mchog chen te //
translated: You are the great branch, the supreme wish-fulfilling tree, the vast fruit of desire for the three worlds.

original: kun la mngon par 'dod don stsol yang khyod la nam yang rnam 'gyur 'ga' yang yod mi mnga' //
analyzed: kun la mngon par 'dod don stsol yang khyod la nam yang rnam 'gyur 'ga' yang yod mi mnga' //
translated: You grant the wishes of all, yet you are never in the slightest way transformed.

original: gang dang gang zhig sdug bsngal tshogs mes lus bsregs de dang de ni nga yis bsgral lo zhes //
analyzed: gang dang gang zhig sdug bsngal tshogs mes lus bsregs de dang de ni nga yis bsgral lo zhes //
translated: ‚ÄúI will save those who are being burned by the fire of suffering,‚Äù

original: nyid kyi dam bca' zhal bzhes sdug bsngal sa 'og bying ba bdag la 'bras bu bcas par mdzod //
analyzed: nyid kyi dam bca' zhal bzhes sdug bsngal sa 'og bying ba bdag la 'bras bu bcas par mdzod //
translated: you promised, and you have made the suffering of the hells your own.

original: ji srid srog chags rnams kyis zil gnon rtsub ldan sdug bsngal shugs de 'phel ba de srid du //
analyzed: ji srid srog chags rnams kyis zil gnon rtsub ldan sdug bsngal shugs de 'phel ba de srid du //
translated: As long as the force of the suffering of beings increases,

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa'i smon lam blo mnga' rnams la rjes brtse mnga' ba lags //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa'i smon lam blo mnga' rnams la rjes brtse mnga' ba lags //
translated: so long do you, who have the aspiration to the vehicle of perfect buddhahood, remain.

original: yum gcig de ltar lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig zol cho nge'i nga ro dpangs mthor 'don pa la //
analyzed: yum gcig de ltar lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig zol cho nge'i nga ro dpangs mthor 'don pa la //
translated: ‚ÄúO Mother, I raise my arms in praise, my cries of lamentation rise up to the heavens.

original: gzhan gyis kyang ni btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na khyed 'dras lta zhig blos ci 'tshal //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang ni btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na khyed 'dras lta zhig blos ci 'tshal //
translated: If others should not remain indifferent, what then of you?‚Äù

original: khyod las gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor pa don gnyer 'dod pa rnyed pa ma khums na //
analyzed: khyod las gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor pa don gnyer 'dod pa rnyed pa ma khums na //
translated: If others, who are not like you, do not obtain the desired wealth,

original: nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags @43a * //
analyzed: nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags @43a * //
translated: they are tormented within,

original: mi dga'i sa gzhi sran du med pas shin tu yang yang bsreg / gal te kho bo sdig can lags na kho bo'i khyod gus chen po 'di dag ci phyir 'phel //
analyzed: mi dga'i sa gzhi sran du med pas shin tu yang yang bsreg / gal te kho bo sdig can lags na kho bo'i khyod gus chen po 'di dag ci phyir 'phel //
translated: and are repeatedly burned by the unbearable ground of unhappiness. If I am wicked, why do these great feelings of devotion increase in me?

original: bden gsung mtshan tsam khums shing dran pa yis kyang khyod gcig kho nas nan gyis sdig sel ba //
analyzed: bden gsung mtshan tsam khums shing dran pa yis kyang khyod gcig kho nas nan gyis sdig sel ba //
translated: You alone, by merely remembering the name of the One Who Speaks the Truth, forcibly remove my sins.

original: de yi phyir na khyod kyi kho bo'i bgyi ba'i khur bu bor ba ji ltar lags pa gsungs //
analyzed: de yi phyir na khyod kyi kho bo'i bgyi ba'i khur bu bor ba ji ltar lags pa gsungs //
translated: Therefore, tell me why you abandon the burden of my work.

original: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur na'ang sman pa snying rje rgya chen sman 'phro gcod par bgyid dam ci //
analyzed: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur na'ang sman pa snying rje rgya chen sman 'phro gcod par bgyid dam ci //
translated: When a patient is about to die, does a greatly compassionate doctor stop treating him?

original: gang gi phyir na 'gron gnas rnga mo cha shas du ma'i thun mong ba ltar rgyu dang ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na 'gron gnas rnga mo cha shas du ma'i thun mong ba ltar rgyu dang ni //
translated: For what reason do you abandon me, who am like a guest, like a camel with many parts, common to many causes,

original: ser sna nga rgyal la sogs rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis rim dang dus gcig bskul bas na //
analyzed: ser sna nga rgyal la sogs rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis rim dang dus gcig bskul bas na //
translated: The faults of avarice, pride, and the like, which are the most contemptible of all, have urged me on, both gradually and all at once.

original: nyin gcig zhabs kyi padma mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed de phyir khyad par du //
analyzed: nyin gcig zhabs kyi padma mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed de phyir khyad par du //
translated: Not having found even a moment to worship your lotus feet for a single day, I am especiallyüîΩ poor and destitute.

original: bkren zhing phongs pa'i tshig dang yi ger bkod 'dis bdag la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
analyzed: bkren zhing phongs pa'i tshig dang yi ger bkod 'dis bdag la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
translated: By these words and letters, which I have set down, may I obtain the fruit of my desire.

original: lha mo gru chag chur bying snying rje dang bcas du ba'i cho nge g-yo med zhan pa rnams //
analyzed: lha mo gru chag chur bying snying rje dang bcas du ba'i cho nge g-yo med zhan pa rnams //
translated: The goddess, who was drowning in the shipwreck, with compassion, with cries of Oh! and Alas! and with constant lamentation,

original: khyod la mngon bstod lhur blangs pa yis 'phral du rgya mtsho dus mtha'i rlung gyen 'tshubs pa'i chu //
analyzed: khyod la mngon bstod lhur blangs pa yis 'phral du rgya mtsho dus mtha'i rlung gyen 'tshubs pa'i chu //
translated: praised and extolled you, and immediately the ocean, with the water of its end-of-the-world winds rising up,

original: gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas dkrugs pas bteg pa'i rba rlabs 'gram ngogs la //
analyzed: gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas dkrugs pas bteg pa'i rba rlabs 'gram ngogs la //
translated: was churned by the waves, which were agitated by the play of their movement, and the water was lifted up by the waves that struck the shore,üîΩ and the sound of their impact, which was like the sound of laughter, carried me to the other shore, where I was able to go as I pleased.

original: brdabs pa'i sgra grag gad rgyangs can gyi pha rol 'gram du rang dga'i nyams kyis rgal par 'gyur //
analyzed: brdabs pa'i sgra grag gad rgyangs can gyi pha rol 'gram du rang dga'i nyams kyis rgal par 'gyur //
translated: üîΩI have told you this story, which is a cause for the arising of faith, in order to increase your faith.üîΩ Now, listen to the story of the merchant who was saved from the ocean.üîΩ The Story of the Merchant Who Was Saved from the OceanüîΩIn the past, in the city of VƒÅrƒÅ·πáasƒ´, there was a great merchant named Vƒ´ryakƒ´rti.

original: du ba 'khyil ba'i sprin nang 'thon zhing nam mkha'i khyim du 'phro ba'i me stag can gyi me //
analyzed: du ba 'khyil ba'i sprin nang 'thon zhing nam mkha'i khyim du 'phro ba'i me stag can gyi me //
translated: The fire, which is born in the midst of the smoke-laden clouds, and which spreads its sparks in the sky,

original: me lce 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i shugs kyis nang du zhugs pa'i khyim na mal du nyal ba rnams //
analyzed: me lce 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i shugs kyis nang du zhugs pa'i khyim na mal du nyal ba rnams //
translated: the fire which enters the houses through the openings of the windows, and which burns the beds where the people are sleeping,

original: khyod la rab btud thal mo spyi bor sbyar zhing ldab ldib gsol ba btab pas skad cig la //
analyzed: khyod la rab btud thal mo spyi bor sbyar zhing ldab ldib gsol ba btab pas skad cig la //
translated: this fire, O God, I bow down to Thee, with folded hands placed on my head, and with stammering words I pray to Thee.

original: glog rab 'gyur ba'i sgeg pas dmar por gyur pa'i sprin gyi chu rlabs dag gis khebs par 'gyur //
analyzed: glog rab 'gyur ba'i sgeg pas dmar por gyur pa'i sprin gyi chu rlabs dag gis khebs par 'gyur //
translated: In a moment, the red clouds, which are the waves of the water of the clouds, are covered with the beauty of the flashing lightning.

original: 'gram pa'i gdu bu myos pa'i chu yis gang ba gnyis ka la brten bung ba'i phreng ba yi //
analyzed: 'gram pa'i gdu bu myos pa'i chu yis gang ba gnyis ka la brten bung ba'i phreng ba yi //
translated: The two cheeks, filled with the water of intoxication, are surrounded by a garland of bees,

original: dar dir sgra yis bab pa'i ban glang zla bos zhe sdang me lce sbar ba'i glang chen gyi //
analyzed: dar dir sgra yis bab pa'i ban glang zla bos zhe sdang me lce sbar ba'i glang chen gyi //
translated: which, with their humming, are like the streams of the moon-elephants, which extinguish the flames of the fire of anger.

original: mche ba'i rtse mo 'od li mthon po'i steng du lus po gzhag pa'ang khyod rjes dran pa yis //
analyzed: mche ba'i rtse mo 'od li mthon po'i steng du lus po gzhag pa'ang khyod rjes dran pa yis //
translated: I place my body on the high peak of the tusk of the elephant, which is the recollection of Thee, O God.

original: ri bo mthon po'i zom rtse'i mkhar la 'dug ba bzhin du dga' zhing 'chi bdag phyir zlog bgyid //üîΩmdung rings bsnun @43b bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing can gyi gtor ma'i ston 'gyed 'brog stong du //üîΩrkun po'i lag rtses bzung bas g-yo ba'i phub dang ral gris dregs pa shas cher 'thon gyur cing //
analyzed: ri bo mthon po'i zom rtse'i mkhar la 'dug ba bzhin du dga' zhing 'chi bdag phyir zlog bgyid // mdung rings bsnun @43b bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal shing can gyi gtor ma'i ston 'gyed 'brog stong du // rkun po'i lag rtses bzung bas g-yo ba'i phub dang ral gris dregs pa shas cher 'thon gyur cing //
translated: He is like a man who, having reached the summit of a high mountain, looks down on the dwellings at its foot.üîΩIn the desert, in the midst of a great crowd, he offers as oblations the heads of men, impaled on long spits, and the flesh of those who have been torn apart by spears.

original: mig ni khro gnyer bcas shing smin 'khyog zur mig lta dang ldan rnams bran du sgo byed pa //
analyzed: mig ni khro gnyer bcas shing smin 'khyog zur mig lta dang ldan rnams bran du sgo byed pa //
translated: The brigands, with their hands full of booty, their eyes rolling, their eyebrows dancing, their swords upraised, are his servants.

original: de ni khyod mtshan dpal gzhi bsam pa'i smyu gus skyo ba med cing gsal bar bris pa lags //üîΩrkang pa'i sbar mo rab rno rdo rje lta bus tshabs cher bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i glang //
analyzed: de ni khyod mtshan dpal gzhi bsam pa'i smyu gus skyo ba med cing gsal bar bris pa lags // rkang pa'i sbar mo rab rno rdo rje lta bus tshabs cher bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i glang //
translated: He is the one who, with the pen of his imagination, has clearly written, without tiring, on the tablet of your glory,üîΩthe elephant, with its temples streaming with rut, its trunk raised, its ears expanded, its feet like thunderbolts,

original: bskams nas khrag mang zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung ya ngas gnya' khebs shing //
analyzed: bskams nas khrag mang zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung ya ngas gnya' khebs shing //
translated: its tail erect, its eyes red with rage, its mouth foaming with rage,

original: khros te rgyang nas mgo la 'dzin 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dags dgra //üîΩkhyod kyi 'thad pa'i spyod pa bstod pa'i don tshim mkhas la skrag ste log nas 'gro ba lags //üîΩdu ba 'khyil 'dra mun pa'i gzugs can rnam 'gyur gdengs can phus 'debs grags pa'i 'gram dgang bar //üîΩbya ba'i ched du kha gdangs 'gyur ba'i lce can thag pa dang 'dra gshin rje'i zhags pa dang // sdig dbang gis phrad slar yang khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba lhur len khyod bdag lhur byed pas //üîΩbung ba myos pa'i phreng ba'i gdub can autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa 'chang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: khros te rgyang nas mgo la 'dzin 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dags dgra // khyod kyi 'thad pa'i spyod pa bstod pa'i don tshim mkhas la skrag ste log nas 'gro ba lags // du ba 'khyil 'dra mun pa'i gzugs can rnam 'gyur gdengs can phus 'debs grags pa'i 'gram dgang bar // bya ba'i ched du kha gdangs 'gyur ba'i lce can thag pa dang 'dra gshin rje'i zhags pa dang // sdig dbang gis phrad slar yang khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba lhur len khyod bdag lhur byed pas // bung ba myos pa'i phreng ba'i gdub can autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa 'chang bar 'gyur //

conduct, and turns away in disgust.üîΩThe serpent, with its form of darkness, coiled like smoke, and hissing with its hood spread out,üîΩis frightened by the sound of your fame, and hides its head original: go khol bskyod pa'i tshig rtsub kyis spyos 'ching ba'i zhags pa rtsub mos nyer bcing bkres pa dang // skom pas mchu dang mgul pa gang zhing 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
analyzed: go khol bskyod pa'i tshig rtsub kyis spyos 'ching ba'i zhags pa rtsub mos nyer bcing bkres pa dang // skom pas mchu dang mgul pa gang zhing 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
translated: He is reviled with harsh words, bound with rough ropes, and tormented by hunger and thirst, his lips and throat parched, and he has taken refuge at the feet of the noble Tara.

original: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sbangs kyang ma rungs rgud pa de dag 'phral du sbang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sbangs kyang ma rungs rgud pa de dag 'phral du sbang bar 'gyur //
translated: Even if he is abandoned by his loving friends, he will be immediately rescued from that terrible misfortune.

original: srin po sgyu ma sprul pa las tshul gyis byas bden pa ma yin gzugs brtsams cha lugs tshul //
analyzed: srin po sgyu ma sprul pa las tshul gyis byas bden pa ma yin gzugs brtsams cha lugs tshul //
translated: The forms created by the magic of the rakshasas are not real, but are composed of false appearances.

original: rnam 'gyur du mdag dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mi bzad cing //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur du mdag dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mi bzad cing //
translated: They are terrifying with a multitude of forms and with the light of weapons that are appropriate to them.

original: mi ro brgyus pa'i rgyu ma'i tha gu'i tshogs dag phreng bar bkod pa rnams kyang khyod rgyus las //
analyzed: mi ro brgyus pa'i rgyu ma'i tha gu'i tshogs dag phreng bar bkod pa rnams kyang khyod rgyus las //
translated: Even the garlands of entrails strung together from human corpses are made from you.

original: btus pa'i gsang sngags dran pas sdig bsal bsrung ba pham pa byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: btus pa'i gsang sngags dran pas sdig bsal bsrung ba pham pa byed par 'gyur //
translated: By remembering the mantra that is extracted from you, one will remove sin, and one will defeat the guardians.

original: chem chem sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can ban glang myos @44a * //üîΩchu'i klung gis rgyun gyi mun gtibs shing //üîΩmtshon cha glog ltar 'gyu ba'i 'od zer dang ldan mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed ba'i tshe //
analyzed: chem chem sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can ban glang myos @44a * // chu'i klung gis rgyun gyi mun gtibs shing // mtshon cha glog ltar 'gyu ba'i 'od zer dang ldan mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed ba'i tshe //
translated: The clouds of battle, with their thunder of weapons, their lightning of flashing banners, and their rain of arrows,

original: phye mar rlog par byed cing dpung stobs che ba'i rnam par sdang ba rnams kyis bkag pa yang //
analyzed: phye mar rlog par byed cing dpung stobs che ba'i rnam par sdang ba rnams kyis bkag pa yang //
translated: are gathered in the darkness of the dust raised by the troops.üîΩBut when the hostile army, strong in numbers, is about to overwhelm you,

original: khyod kyi spros pa gsol btab dpa' bo gcig gis dgra bo'i sa gzhi nan gyis 'thag par byed //üîΩsdig spyod rgyun chags las byung phol mig tshabs chen dag las rnag khrag rul pa zags pa yis //
analyzed: khyod kyi spros pa gsol btab dpa' bo gcig gis dgra bo'i sa gzhi nan gyis 'thag par byed // sdig spyod rgyun chags las byung phol mig tshabs chen dag las rnag khrag rul pa zags pa yis //
translated: you, O Hero, with a single puff of your breath, crush the earth with your foes.üîΩThe abscesses of sin, which have long been forming, burst open, and the putrid blood and pus flow out.

original: myags pa'i sha lpags dang 'bral rtsa sgo'i bu gar srog chags 'gul bas zos pas lus zad rnams ;
analyzed: myags pa'i sha lpags dang 'bral rtsa sgo'i bu gar srog chags 'gul bas zos pas lus zad rnams ;
translated: The flesh and skin rot away, and worms appear in the openings of the veins.

original: / khyod kyi zhabs la brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu goms par bsten la rab tu dga' ba yis //
analyzed: / khyod kyi zhabs la brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu goms par bsten la rab tu dga' ba yis //
translated: The body is consumed, and you, O Sage, with the medicine of your feet,

original: sa le sbram dang 'dra ba'i lus dang ldan zhing padma dkar po ltar yangs mig can 'gyur //
analyzed: sa le sbram dang 'dra ba'i lus dang ldan zhing padma dkar po ltar yangs mig can 'gyur //
translated: And a body like pure gold, and eyes like white lotuses.

original: gang gi rna ba'i snod du bla ma rnams kyis nyer sbyar man ngag gleng mo ma lhung zhing //
analyzed: gang gi rna ba'i snod du bla ma rnams kyis nyer sbyar man ngag gleng mo ma lhung zhing //
translated: But the advice of the gurus, which is poured into the vessel of his ear, is not lost,

original: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs sar lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang yin pa //üîΩde yang khyod la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i 'byor pa dang bcas pa'i //
analyzed: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs sar lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang yin pa // de yang khyod la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i 'byor pa dang bcas pa'i //
translated: And he is not obliged to be dumb in the assembly of the wise, being poor in the wealth of learning.üîΩBut he, by the power of his devotion to you, obtains the sovereignty of speech,

original: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
translated: And in the king's court he takes the lion's throne from the disputants.

original: sar nyal rngul gyis lus gos rked ngos mdoms dkris ras ral yan lag rnam par mngon 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: sar nyal rngul gyis lus gos rked ngos mdoms dkris ras ral yan lag rnam par mngon 'gyur zhing //
translated: He sleeps on the ground, his body covered with sweat, his loincloth of rags hanging down, his limbs all showing through.

original: shig gis tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi khyim sgor rdza chag dum bur zas dag slong ba yang //
analyzed: shig gis tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi khyim sgor rdza chag dum bur zas dag slong ba yang //
translated: He is tormented by lice, and goes to beg at other people's doors, in a broken pot.

original: khyod mnyes bgyis bas na chung mchog ngal rnams kyis g-yabs ba'i rnga yab kyis 'dzum mdzes pa'i sa //
analyzed: khyod mnyes bgyis bas na chung mchog ngal rnams kyis g-yabs ba'i rnga yab kyis 'dzum mdzes pa'i sa //
translated: Your face is fanned by the best of young maidens, with a yak-tail fan, as you smile.

original: glang chen myos pa'i chu yis gdong pa'i mche ba gtams shing gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa 'dzin //
analyzed: glang chen myos pa'i chu yis gdong pa'i mche ba gtams shing gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa 'dzin //
translated: An elephant, his tusks filled with the water of rut, holds up a single parasol.

original: skye bo bkren pa rnams kyis yum gcig zhabs 'bring dang ni so tshis bzo yi spyod pa rnams //
analyzed: skye bo bkren pa rnams kyis yum gcig zhabs 'bring dang ni so tshis bzo yi spyod pa rnams //
translated: The poor people, O Mother, with the activities of service and livelihood,

original: spong pa'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer blangs bsod nams kyis //
analyzed: spong pa'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer blangs bsod nams kyis //
translated: are exhausted by the various means of abandoning [poverty], and by the merit accumulated in previous births,

original: nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis phya las 'da' bar mdzad khyod la //
analyzed: nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis phya las 'da' bar mdzad khyod la //
translated: you, who surpass the gods, are the one who grants wealth to those who have not obtained the wealth of the results of accumulated virtue and to those who are destitute.

original: gsol ba btab pas phyi nas nor bu sa las gter ni gser tshogs 'byung ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsol ba btab pas phyi nas nor bu sa las gter ni gser tshogs 'byung ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: By supplicating you, later on, one obtains a treasure of jewels and gold that arises from the earth.

original: 'tsho ba chad pas ngo tsha khyim thab gos zad @44b ma yis spyo bar byed cing bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: 'tsho ba chad pas ngo tsha khyim thab gos zad @44b ma yis spyo bar byed cing bdag nyid ni //
translated: One's livelihood is cut off, one's husband is ashamed, one's clothes are worn out, one is scolded by one's own self,

original: gso bar byed phyir gnyen 'dab bu dang gnyen bshes rnams kyis rgyang rings spangs par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: gso bar byed phyir gnyen 'dab bu dang gnyen bshes rnams kyis rgyang rings spangs par gyur pa yis //
translated: Your friends and relatives, your sons and kinsmen, have abandoned you, having cast you out to the far distance, in order to heal themselves.

original: khyod la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras //
analyzed: khyod la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras //
translated: When you have told them of your suffering, your wife, your household, will be awakened from sleep by the tinkling of her bracelets,

original: gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed //
analyzed: gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byed //
translated: and will take charge of the house, with its threshold crossed by a horse‚Äôs hoof.

original: gal te khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas tsam zhig mchis na phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang // bud med mtshan brgyan 'og pag chen po g-yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang // rta mchog spu kha sdo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas tsam zhig mchis na phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang // bud med mtshan brgyan 'og pag chen po g-yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang // rta mchog spu kha sdo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni //
translated: If you have any share in his kindness, there will appear a wheel that pervades the regions, a woman adorned with the signs of maidenhood, a great elephant with six tusks, a horse with a mane of iridescent hair like a peacock‚Äôs neck, and a flawless jewel of virtue,

original: nyi ltar mdangs ldan 'od can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rtul phod dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nyi ltar mdangs ldan 'od can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rtul phod dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: radiant as the sun, a householder with a full treasury, a minister bold and strong, and an army.

original: khyod kyis rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du //
analyzed: khyod kyis rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du //
translated: You have attained the state of a vidyadhara, and the sandalwood water perfumes the gem-studded floor.

original: sdu gu ma yis dus 'debs sdug pa dang rol rdzes su chags pas bde ba'i nyer spyad gsar //
analyzed: sdu gu ma yis dus 'debs sdug pa dang rol rdzes su chags pas bde ba'i nyer spyad gsar //
translated: The lovely one, with her fresh enjoyment of love, is marked by the time of the day.

original: gus par sbyar zhing lag sbom mthon po ral gri'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g-yo ba yis //
analyzed: gus par sbyar zhing lag sbom mthon po ral gri'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g-yo ba yis //
translated: With her arms raised high, her bracelets jingling with the blue light of her bangles,

original: rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te m'a la ya yi me tog skyed mos tshal du 'gro //
analyzed: rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te m'a la ya yi me tog skyed mos tshal du 'gro //
translated: the queen of the vidyadharas is free to go to the garden of the jasmine trees.

original: nu ma'i thon kor do shal gyis mnan mig dkyus ring pos rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
analyzed: nu ma'i thon kor do shal gyis mnan mig dkyus ring pos rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
translated: Her breasts are pressed by her necklace, her long eyes rival her ear lotuses,

original: skra bskyil manda ra bas brgyangs pa'i ze 'bru sar pa'i dri yis myos pa'i bung ba dang ldan pa'i //
analyzed: skra bskyil manda ra bas brgyangs pa'i ze 'bru sar pa'i dri yis myos pa'i bung ba dang ldan pa'i //
translated: and her hair, stretched by the mandara flowers, is filled with bees intoxicated by the scent of the jasmine flowers.

original: lha yi bu mo rkang gdub rags pa'i sil snyan 'og pag sgra yi rgyun gyis shin tu dpangs //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo rkang gdub rags pa'i sil snyan 'og pag sgra yi rgyun gyis shin tu dpangs //
translated: The celestial maiden, with the continuous sound of her anklets and girdle, is very beautiful.

original: bskyed pa'i 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon ldan pa dag la gus dang bcas pas gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon ldan pa dag la gus dang bcas pas gsol ba 'debs //
translated: You who are proud, arrogant, and full of lustful thoughts, you should supplicate with devotion those who are protected by the Dharma.

original: rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad mtsho ze 'bru rdo rje'i tshogs ldan zhing //
analyzed: rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad mtsho ze 'bru rdo rje'i tshogs ldan zhing //
translated: Inside the pond, adorned with jewels, is a golden lotus lake with a vajra-like pistil.

original: yongs 'du'i ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
analyzed: yongs 'du'i ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
translated: There grow wish-fulfilling trees, with fragrant pistils like canopies of pollen.

original: lha yi grong khyer rangs bgyid lha mo bi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sil snyan ni //
analyzed: lha yi grong khyer rangs bgyid lha mo bi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sil snyan ni //
translated: In the divine city that delights the gods, the goddesses skillfully play the vƒ´·πáƒÅs and flutes, and the musical instruments

original: snyan par bsgrags pa'i dga' tshal lha mo khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun rings myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: snyan par bsgrags pa'i dga' tshal lha mo khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun rings myong bar 'gyur //
translated: are played in a pleasing way. For a long time, you will experience worship in the pleasure grove of the goddesses.

original: sems rgyud khyod la gtad pas bsod nams mthu 'bar rnams ni mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig tu //üîΩga pur ae la li shi shing tsha aa ka ru dang @45a * //
analyzed: sems rgyud khyod la gtad pas bsod nams mthu 'bar rnams ni mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig tu // ga pur ae la li shi shing tsha aa ka ru dang @45a * //
translated: By entrusting your mindstream to them, the power of your merit will blaze, and you will be with beautiful women,üîΩwith water for bathing that has the scent of camphor, cardamom, sandalwood, and agaru,

original: spang spos phye ma'i dri chu can //
analyzed: spang spos phye ma'i dri chu can //
translated: and the scent of powdered incense.

original: glong 'khor rba rlabs bud med sdu gu'i nu ma 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba //
analyzed: glong 'khor rba rlabs bud med sdu gu'i nu ma 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba //
translated: The waves are the breasts of beautiful women, swelling with the pride of love.

original: dal 'bab gang g'a'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur //üîΩkhyod kyi spyan ras mang du phog pas dag pa'i bka' la lha gtso dul ba'i khur bu yis //
analyzed: dal 'bab gang g'a'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur // khyod kyi spyan ras mang du phog pas dag pa'i bka' la lha gtso dul ba'i khur bu yis //
translated: The Ganges, flowing gently, is the water for their sports, which they scatter in all directions.üîΩYour glances, O Lord, are cast in all directions, and the gods, well-disciplined, bow their diadems.

original: cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho ris steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni //
analyzed: cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho ris steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni //
translated: The celestial elephants, with their frontal lobes,üîΩadorned with ornaments, swaying to and fro,

original: khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa la zhon lus kyi ba spu shas cher langs pa'i bde sogs kyi //
analyzed: khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa la zhon lus kyi ba spu shas cher langs pa'i bde sogs kyi //
translated: carry you, whose body hair stands on end with bliss,

original: lag rings 'do li bar med bskyil cing 'chang ba rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul las skyong //
analyzed: lag rings 'do li bar med bskyil cing 'chang ba rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul las skyong //
translated: and hold you in their trunks, O protector of the world, O Vajra-holder.

original: khyod sku gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyi gdan bzhugs bde bar gshegs 'od mkha' khyab bla re can //
analyzed: khyod sku gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyi gdan bzhugs bde bar gshegs 'od mkha' khyab bla re can //
translated: You sit on the jeweled seat at the crown of the body of the Sugata, whose light fills the sky with a canopy.

original: nyi ma shar ka bye ba lta bur ches gsal 'od zer dag gis 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
analyzed: nyi ma shar ka bye ba lta bur ches gsal 'od zer dag gis 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
translated: Like the sun at dawn, he is very clear, and his rays fill the three worlds with light.

original: zhabs gcig g-yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud pa //
analyzed: zhabs gcig g-yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud pa //
translated: With one foot extended, he is majestic in his great stride, and Brahma, Indra, Vishnu, and Shiva bow to him.

original: bsgoms pas skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa rgyun ni gcod par bgyid par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms pas skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa rgyun ni gcod par bgyid par 'gyur //
translated: Those who rely on the generation stage, through meditation, will cut the continuum of the fears of existence.

original: la la khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel pa yis //
analyzed: la la khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel pa yis //
translated: Some, with wrath, are connected with the light rays of the hosts of hands and weapons.

original: nam mkha'i khongs khyab sbrul gyi gdu bu'i gdengs ka dag gis spyod pa mi 'phrogs mi bzad pa'i //üîΩsdang rnams skrag mdzad gad mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs bas brlang bskyed tshe na ro langs ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khongs khyab sbrul gyi gdu bu'i gdengs ka dag gis spyod pa mi 'phrogs mi bzad pa'i // sdang rnams skrag mdzad gad mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs bas brlang bskyed tshe na ro langs ni //
translated: They are unconquerable and terrifying, with hoods of snakes pervading the realm of space.üîΩWhen the terrifying skull-cup is beaten, the zombies,

original: thal mo'i sgra chen sgrogs pas bsgyings shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen pa'i ca co drags par khums //
analyzed: thal mo'i sgra chen sgrogs pas bsgyings shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen pa'i ca co drags par khums //
translated: who are frightened by the wrathful ones, are filled with the great, haughty, and arrogant play of the great sound of the clapping of hands.

original: la sbu'i khung re nas byung nam mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas sa 'og mtho ris gnas //
analyzed: la sbu'i khung re nas byung nam mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas sa 'og mtho ris gnas //
translated: From the pores of his skin he sent forth a rain of flowers, filling the whole sky, the earth, the regions below and above.

original: tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub pa rnams gnas shing //
analyzed: tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub pa rnams gnas shing //
translated: The gods, the Nagas, the Gandharvas, the men, the Siddhas, the Brahmas, the Indras, and all the rest,

original: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas kyis dang // ngo mtshar khams gsum phyag 'os brtan dang g-yo bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor khums //üîΩla las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta bur dmar bar khums //üîΩde bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan aanda rnyil du btags pa'i phye ma 'thul @45b 'drar sngon por khums //
analyzed: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas kyis dang // ngo mtshar khams gsum phyag 'os brtan dang g-yo bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor khums // la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta bur dmar bar khums // de bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan aanda rnyil du btags pa'i phye ma 'thul @45b 'drar sngon por khums //
translated: the rays of light which filled the points of the horizon, the hundreds of Sugatas, the infinite emanations, the marvels, the beings of the three worlds, the moving and unmoving, all were gathered into his body.üîΩSome were like the color of the young morning sun, red as a coral flower.üîΩOthers were like the color of the precious sapphire, the color of the smoke of the burning antimony of the mountains.

original: la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dkrugs dang zho bas ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od ltar khums te //
analyzed: la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dkrugs dang zho bas ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od ltar khums te //
translated: Others were like the color of the agitated milk ocean, white as the foam of the curd, shining like gold.

original: khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bor shes bzhin nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bor shes bzhin nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad 'gyur //
translated: You are different, because you are related to the application of mindfulness that knows the various bodies.

original: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mes rab tu gsal ba yi //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mes rab tu gsal ba yi //
translated: The number of your qualities is illuminated by the lamp of omniscient wisdom.

original: shes bya mtha' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sras kyis mkhyen te //üîΩbdag 'dra bya rog sgrogs ltar kha gdangs ku co cher 'don gang lags de ni mi bzad pa'i //
analyzed: shes bya mtha' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sras kyis mkhyen te // bdag 'dra bya rog sgrogs ltar kha gdangs ku co cher 'don gang lags de ni mi bzad pa'i //
translated: All objects of knowledge are known by the Omniscient One and his sons, who have the power of the truth of all things.

original: sdug bsngal rims nad dag gis bskyed pa'i nad can sems kyi rgyud la bzhad gad rgyu zhig lags //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rims nad dag gis bskyed pa'i nad can sems kyi rgyud la bzhad gad rgyu zhig lags //
translated: But my questions, like the cawing of a crow, are a great clamoring with gaping mouth, which is a cause of laughter in the mind of one who is afflicted by the disease of unbearable suffering.

original: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyod kyis khyad par du mkhyen cing //
analyzed: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyod kyis khyad par du mkhyen cing //
translated: The first of my questions you have already understood well,

original: de bklag brjod pas ngal ba'i tshul ni mi mkhas rang sems tshi ma pa'i bye brag lags mod kyi //
analyzed: de bklag brjod pas ngal ba'i tshul ni mi mkhas rang sems tshi ma pa'i bye brag lags mod kyi //
translated: and although it is a cause of weariness to read and recite it, it is a sign of the stupidity of my own mind.

original: 'on kyang sdug par don shes zin pa'i gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du 'dug bzhin tshig dag gis //
analyzed: 'on kyang sdug par don shes zin pa'i gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du 'dug bzhin tshig dag gis //
translated: But when I am in the presence of a dear friend, who knows me well and loves me,

original: sdug bsngal phyung ste snying yang seng zhes byed pa nyid du gyur nas rnal mar gnas tshor bzhin //
analyzed: sdug bsngal phyung ste snying yang seng zhes byed pa nyid du gyur nas rnal mar gnas tshor bzhin //
translated: I am ashamed to speak of my suffering, and I pretend to be well.

original: dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal ma khyod bstod chu yis yid dag par //
analyzed: dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal ma khyod bstod chu yis yid dag par //
translated: O CandrƒÅpƒ´·∏ça, fill my heart with the pure water of your praise, which is a ray of the moon in the ocean of all that is good and lovely.

original: bgyis pa bdag la tshim byed mthong ba stsol cig ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod //
analyzed: bgyis pa bdag la tshim byed mthong ba stsol cig ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod //
translated: Give me the sight that satisfies me, and make me grow with the water of your wisdom.

original: thugs rje shas ches nang gi mun sol gang phyir khyod kyi bstod pa tsam zhig kyang //
analyzed: thugs rje shas ches nang gi mun sol gang phyir khyod kyi bstod pa tsam zhig kyang //
translated: Since your compassion is so great that it dispels the darkness within,

original: don yod 'gro ba dag na skye dgu rnams kyi bde legs gnas ni gcig bu lags bar khums //
analyzed: don yod 'gro ba dag na skye dgu rnams kyi bde legs gnas ni gcig bu lags bar khums //
translated: believe that your praise alone is the one source of all good fortune for living beings in this world.

original: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes bya ma nges pa'i //
analyzed: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes bya ma nges pa'i //
translated: I have praised only a portion of your many virtues, and I have not said, ‚ÄúThis much is enough.‚Äù

original: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngar ba ro myang ma grol bar du longs spyad pa //üîΩgang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
analyzed: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngar ba ro myang ma grol bar du longs spyad pa // gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
translated: Until liberation, enjoy the sweet fruit of merit and auspiciousness.üîΩBy that attainment, may this world quickly go to the city of SukhƒÅvatƒ´, the son of the Sugata,üîΩthe abode of the auspicious signs of the feet of the noble Loke≈õvara.üîΩThe Garland of Flowers, a Praise of the Noble TƒÅrƒÅ,

original: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i grong khyer bde ba can zhes bya der myur 'gro shog / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang
analyzed: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i grong khyer bde ba can zhes bya der myur 'gro shog / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang
translated: was composed by the great master called the omniscient K·π£ƒÅntivƒÅdi,

original: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gcig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs @46a * //
analyzed: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gcig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs @46a * //
translated: who was single-pointedly engaged in the conduct of a bodhisattva.üîΩIt is complete.

original: so ; // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka wa rm'a dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba las /
analyzed: so ; // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka wa rm'a dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba las /
translated: It was translated by the Indian preceptor Kanakavarman and the Tibetan translator Patsap Nyima Drak.

original: slad kyis pandi ta chen po ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so /
analyzed: slad kyis pandi ta chen po ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so /
translated: Later, the great pandita Manikashri Jnananatha and the Tibetan translator Choje Pal, the monk Shakya, slightly revised and corrected it.
